How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?

How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
Si señor
sweet
Actualmente en el punto de partida, veo una ramita a la izquierda. ¿Adónde debo ir desde aquí?
go straight
okay, stepping over the twig
now on a small island with a tiger. what's next, mate?
go right
got it, heading southeast
en una isla con una mariposa ahora. ¿a donde?
go back
cool, heading back to the tiger
what now?
go north east
no puedo, mi amigo, al noreste solo hay agua
¿quizás otro camino?
go east
¡oops! east is just more water
maybe a different direction?
keep the tiger to your left and move straight
i'm on it, heading southwest
ahora en una isla grande con un loro sentado en un árbol. ¿a donde?
go back
okay, back to the tiger again
go to the only island you did not go before
got it, back on the path to the parrot
go back
got it, heading back to the parrot once again
¿que sigue?
head back to the tiger
copy that, back at the tiger
now what, captain?
go to the parrot
done, at the parrot again
¿Hacia dónde ahora?
now go south east
right-o, heading southeast
cross the water
okay, crossing over some rocks
ahora en una nueva isla con una rana. ¿próximo?
now go west on top of crocodile
ah, nice! walking carefully past the croc now
keep going west cross the water
roger that, crossing more water
can you see giraffe?
¡Sí, jirafa vista! ¿ahora que?
now go south
okay, heading south
oh, i see a snake. should i keep going?
yes keep going
Lo tengo, pasando junto a la serpiente.
see the chest?
oh, sí, veo el tesoro
Towards there, my captain?
yes
alright, heading east towards the treasure
*finalizado*

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
si

bien, vamos a empezar! da un paso al oeste, pasando por debajo de un banco de madera, hasta llegar a un cruce de camino cerca de un puesto de flores. luego haz un giro de 180 grados a tu izquierda hasta el mismo camino
Let's go back to the little white dog.
i am at the white dog
great job! now go south, over that branch
continúa hacia el sur hasta que veas otro perro blanco al lado de un lindo picnic rojo y blanco
i am at the picnic spot
awesome! you're doing great
now go west, but make sure you touch a bowl of berries. keep going in that direction
ok i see fishes now what?
¡no hay problema! ahora necesitas cruzar el río por otro ramal de madera en dirección norte.
i am at the flower stall
fantastic! now swerve around the green bush, but make sure to circle it from the right
the florist stand is the next thing to reach
i am at the florist stall
awesome! now you should turn left and move along westward, passing under that stand
¡Pronto llegarás a un puente gigante con dos ciclistas!
i see 2 old people
that's perfect! now take a small walk southwards, you'll have the old folks on one side and a branch on the other
i see deer
excellent! go east now, keep the branch on your left and the bush on your right
continúa hasta llegar al ciervo joven
i see deer
whoop whoop, you made it! that brown young deer is our final stop! really well done!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
si señor, go south
cool, i've moved south. now i see a dog sitting next to a fire
También hay un hongo rojo al otro lado del fuego. ¿que sigue?
keep moving east with the fire to your right and dog to your left
alrighty, i'm now at the red mushroom
where to next?
go south east with the fire to your right and mushroom to your left
gotcha! i've made it to the blue car, i see a telescope further south
¿Dónde sigue?
go west with the bush on the front of the car to your left and then follow the brown road south
ok, i've followed the road and reached the telescope, i see some rocks to the west
towards the rocks?
take the path between the bush and the telescope and go south, then go west towards the rocks
great, i'm at the rocks now, i see a wooden house beyond them
¿voy a la casa?
yes just go to the wooden house
finished, i'm at the house now!
go to the front of the house, towards the porch
finished, i'm at the porch! thanks for the guidance, mate
Esa fue toda una aventura. ¿Qué sigue en la fila?
that should be it
awesome! that was fun
until the next map, then?
but this map should end, it did not end
oh, my bad
*terminado*, hemos terminado con este mapa. ¡Hasta la próxima aventura!

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
lets go
okay! we're starting at the three palm trees. move to the closest one and follow the path under it going south-west
after that, turn right and pass the second tree. got that part?
in between the palm trees or around?
around, buddy
simplemente pase por el lado derecho
nice i see doggo
great! now drift a bit to the left of our furry friend and veer right again, heading south
got it?
i am at the small rock to the extrem right
perfecto! ahora, deslízate entre ese pequeño peñasco a tu derecha y la gran roca a tu izquierda
tu destino por ahora es el agua que ves
i see big red crab
good spot! now, let's change direction buddy
take a right, and swim alongside that huge rock to your left. keep moving west!
i see another small rock and a shark farther ahead
Muy bien, una vez que estés cerca de la roca mediana, ¡haz un giro brusco a la derecha antes de encontrarte con nuestro amigo tiburón!
i am at the shark
whoops! no worries, just turn right and make your way back onto dry land. you'll see a medium size rock and a colorful ball
pass in between them and continue north. sound good?
found it
perfecto! now, shift a little to the left. aim for the north-west
Verás una carpa roja y un gran altavoz. deslizarse entre ellos. ¿Has llegado hasta ahora?
si
top! now, let's play a bit of tag with that red tent
swing around it in an arc form
done
bueno! now, pure south to the sea
done
¡pero espera ahí mismo! ¡No saltes todavía! Gira a la derecha y sigue la orilla hacia el oeste, pasando por debajo del kayak rojo.
ok done
genial! ahora gira 90 grados a la derecha, norte
mueve a lo largo del kayak hasta que llegues a un pequeño arbusto verde. ¿lo ves?

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I enjoy learning new words in other languages including slangs

general_survey.answer: I also understand German pretty well but I don't speak the language anymore
